'''13w38c''' is the seventh [[snapshot]] for [[Java Edition 1.7.2]], released on September 20, 2013<ref>https://web.archive.org/web/0/https://www.mojang.com/2013/09/minecraft-snapshot-13w38a/</ref> to fix some of the bugs and crashes in the [[13w38a]] and [[13w38b]] snapshots.

13w38c was reuploaded a few minutes after release.{{more info}}

== Changes ==
=== Blocks ===
'''[[Air]]'''
* Removed as an item, like most of the technical blocks as of 13w37a.
* Not obtainable with {{cmd|give}}.

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|fixedin=13w38c|prefix=Minecraft
|;old
|3973|Players who mine redstone lamps with Silk Touch would get a lit redstone lamp in their inventory. 
|;dev
|32028|Shader never disappears in F3 once it appears.
|;prev
|31876|[[Hopper (crash utility)|Hopper]]: java.lang.NullPointerException.
|31880|Hopper: java.lang.NullPointerException.
|31883|Killing mobs sometimes drop "tile.air.name" .
|31892|Crashes the game when entering the Nether.
}}</onlyinclude>

== Trivia ==
* 13w38c was previously removed from the [[launcher]] for some time, but was added back in September 2018.
